data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Nukulaelae against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nukulaelae, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Nukulaelae, Tuvalu.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Nukulaelae, Tuvalu that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Nukulaelae, Tuvalu need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: God, guide the 69 believers in Nukulaelae to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Nukulaelae, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Nukulaelae to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.section_summary:
the state of Nukulaelae, Tuvalu has a population of 300.

We estimate Nukulaelae has 69 people who might know Jesus, 227 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.
